title: Core Stats/Plugin section in Solr UI has new sections that are empty (and no icon)
description: Maybe this is an intentional change, but that doesn't look good to me. Opening this Jira to investigate

comments.content: I would guess its related to SOLR-4735 and JIRAs related to that one.
comments.author: Kevin Risden

comments.content: This is a duplicate of SOLR-9969 - the MBeanRequestHandler isn't returning any data for those categories, but since they exist it's reporting them as empty.
comments.author: Cassandra Targett
